title: Mysteries of a Barbershop
descriptions: In "Mysteries of a Barbershop" (2018), a small town's barbershop becomes the center of community life and supernatural occurrences. As the town's secrets are unveiled through the conversations of regular customers, a young barber uncovers a dark past linked to the shop. Tensions rise as the town's residents are forced to confront long-buried truths, leading to a climactic reveal that changes everything.
